summary: This collection of documents pertains to the covert security approval and subsequent investigation of Robert West Pugh, who was considered for a position as a First Officer in the Far East under Project HBILKA/JBGREED. The documents detail the initial approval, concerns raised regarding Pugh's past drinking problem and his brother's alleged communist associations, and the eventual cancellation of his employment following his resignation.
title: Robert West Pugh Covert Security Approval and Investigation
